section.name: Set session information
section.p: Describes the settings related to the session information. One time the crawl results saved as a single session information. You can check the run time and the number of indexed.

subsection.name: How to set up
subsection.p: In Administrator account after logging in, click the session information menu.

subsection.name: Session information list
subsection.p: You can remove all session information and click the Delete link all in the running.

subsection.name: Session details
subsection.p: To specify a session ID, you can see crawling content.

ul.li: Information about the entire crawl Cralwer *:
FsCrawl *: information about the file system crawling
Information issued by Solr server optimization optimize *:
Commit *: information about the commit was issued to the Solr server.
